column4: does anyone know why edgy's broken the wg311 netgear wireless card?
does anyone know why edgy no longer creates the /dev/sda* device files?
they decided to port vold from solaris and go with that node structure now its under /dev/dsk/234234234235023/23452353450234 depending on the device
so i can just change the entry in fstab to point to it, and i get my disk back right?
well i was kidding about the above.  but yeah just update fstab
any idea how edgy also broke wireless and graphics, and now freezes at boot without nolapic? why all the regressions - did no-one test edgy at all?
